title: Rainy city driving, moderate speed, no significant braking
caption: A red bus drives on a rainy city street with a white and blue truck on the left.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.2 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed, maintaining a safe distance from the vehicles around it. It is important to keep an eye on the traffic lights and signs to ensure safe navigation through the city streets.
